_header: It was once a gardener / That to God was both lief and dear
Title(s): Northern Homily Cycle ; The Thrifty Gardener
_description: The Thrifty Gardener, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HIt was enes a Gardinereþat was to god boþe leue and
                    dere…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God ȝif vs grace þat we mayCome to þat Ioye
                    þat lasteþ ay. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Hou a mon wytdrou almesdede forto gadere money (f.
                    207vb)

yt was som tym a gardynerþat was to god both leue &
                    dere…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…In clene lyf tyll our endyng& tyll hys þi all vs
                    bryng

                    dere…

                    þou bryng Amen
